data.actual_result: Section names start condensed, and then spread out, causing an extra white line to appear
data.expected_result: Section names are spread out with no extra white line
data.short_description: Friend's list headers are condensed, and cause an extra white line to appear after loading (iPad only, possibly 2nd generation iPad specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friends list - Completely close out of Discord - Reopen Discord - Observe the friends list sections as Discord loads
